general_treatment.description: Treatment should be tailored to an individual’s symptoms via a shared decision-making process with your healthcare provider.

medications.Levodopa: The most potent medication for Parkinson’s disease.
medications.Dopamine Agonists: Stimulate parts of the brain influenced by dopamine.
medications.Amantadine: Used to help tremor and reduce dyskinesias.
medications.MAO-B Inhibitors: Make more dopamine available to the brain.

exercise: Exercise is vital for maintaining balance, mobility, and activities of daily living.
